title: Why does H2O, Brubswick water, have to put a painted blue line on curbs to identify where your water meter is? They have been reading the meter for years without this grafitti marking and now due to new meter installation this terrible paint job was done. Check out some corner houses in the Willows where they wrote the address on the curb. Are they going to come back and clean it up---doubt it but if a juvenile was to do it he would probably be arrested.  Why did\'t they use flags for this?
